Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Dare-devil \Dare"-dev`il\, n. A reckless fellow. Also used adjectively; as, dare-devil excitement. [1913 Webster]
A humorous dare-devil -- the very man To suit my prpose. --Ld. Lytton. [1913 Webster]

daredevil adj : presumptuously daring; "a daredevil test pilot having the right stuff" [syn: {brash}, {temerarious}] n : a reckless impetuous irresponsible person [syn: {madcap}, {hothead}, {swashbuckler}, {lunatic}, {harum-scarum}]
